RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 149500. (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE O F $50,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise ClaimW ill Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUSTIN BAY was bumped soundly at the start, went three then two wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the far turn, chased the runner-up under a right-handed crop in upper stretch, switched to a left-handed crop outside the furlong marker, gained to take the lead into the final sixteenth and prevailed under strong urging. VIRTUAL REALITY broke in and hit the gate, went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was roused outside the five-sixteenths, came under a left-handed crop in upper stretch, shortened stride into the final furlong, swapped back to her inside lead coming to the sixteenth-pole then was overtaken while just able to get the place. MIA BEA STAR broke out then was corrected by the rider, dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, settled off the pace, paused off heels while inside leaving the backstretch then shifted to the two path, moved to the four path shortly thereafter, gained late on the bend, turned into upper stretch under the crop then drifted out around the three-sixteenths, pursued the top two while outside in the final furlong and finished willingly to just miss the place while able to get the show. SABRA TUFF was bumped on both sides at the start then squeezed back in tight quarters, angled in at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the first turn, settled at the back, was urged along before the five-eighths, dropped from the three path to the rail on the far turn, shifted four wide late on that bend, gained under a drive into upper stretch, pursued the top three to the finish and earned the last spot in the superfecta. OCEAN GATEWAY broke in and bumped with a foe, went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was urged along passing the five-eighths then moved inward, raced inside early on the turn then shifted three wide, continued three wide through the far turn and failed to respond. HONEY MONEY raced under a snug hold while two then three wide on the first turn, was rated off the pace, dropped from the two path to the rail while falling to the rear on the final turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Virtual Reality
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,hit gate,ins pace,ask2nd trn,led to1/16,overtakn,held2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mia Bea Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Reyana and Reya Racing and Rampersaud Totaram
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,2p-ins1st,settld,off heels1/2,2-4p2nd,drift out,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: snug hold 2-3p1st,rated,2p-ins2nd turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Bustin Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,3-2p1st,stlkd outside,ask2p2nd,long drive,up final 1/16

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Robert D. Rosenthal & Peter Rosenthal & Martin Greenberg

ENTRY.NAME: Sabra Tuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn brk,squeezed,mvd,ins-2p1st,urged,4w1/4,evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Ocean Gateway
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in,bmpd,4w1st,mvd in5/8,ins-3p2nd turn,no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 136500. (UP TO $23,751 NYSBFOA) (PURSE $105,000 FOR NON-NYB) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUGAR HI pressed the pace of LADY MOSCATO from the outside two then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four then three wide into upper stretch, took narrow command a furlong out, dug in and edged clear to the finish to prevail. LADY MOSCATO coaxed from the start, cut the pace along the inside down the backstretch under pressure from the aforementioned foe, tipped to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong out, kept on to preserve the place honors. LADY BLITZ coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages while clear for the show honors. CLEARLY A TEST hustled from the gate, chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the two path into upper stretch and improved position. HONEY DIJON coaxed from the start, chased three then four wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the stretch. CLASSY MISCHIEF tossed her head slightly at the break and was unsettled at the start getting away last and conceding three lengths to the front, grew rank facing kickback and was guided four wide before tucking three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths detached at the tail of the field, went six wide into upper stretch and made no impact. TAP THE KEG stumbled at the start albeit only lost at most a length of ground to the front, chased just off the inside down the backstretch, then tipped three to four wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued four wide for home and tired. SOCA chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Classy Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: unsettled st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Clearly a Test
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Soca
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 3-2w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Blitz
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, dug in, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Moscato
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pressured pace ins, ins 1/4, collared 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Hi
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4-3w upper, up 1/8, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich III & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Tap the Keg
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club Pavilion Racing and Twin Sports Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 4w 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Dijon
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 3-2w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 89. Claiming Purse 50000. (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIVA READY was restless in the gate, settled off the pace, moved from the rail to the two path early on the turn, shifted out in upper stretch, had her path taken outside the eighth-pole then altered towards the inside for room, rallied in the final furlong and closed strongly to win going away. LINARITE settled towards the rear on the outside, went four then three wide on the turn, angled out nearing the furlong marker and finished with good energy to just get the place. SARATOGA GAZE was restless in the gate, bumped with a rival at the start, tracked the pace on the outside, ranged up in the two path to make bid on the turn, took the lead into the stretch then kicked clear, remained clear under a left-handed crop into the final sixteenth but was overtaken then just lost the place but held the show. SMOKIN' HOT KITTY broke out and bumped with a foe then hustled, settled for a couple of strides then came back under urging, was ridden along off the pace, went three then four wide on the turn, pursued the runner-up into the final furlong, came between foes into the final sixteenth and finished with good courage for the last spot in the superfecta. ROSEMARY POTATOES was hustled from the gate, settled off the pace, came out while dropping back leaving the backstretch, went three wide on the turn, was driven four wide into the stretch, moved out near the furlong marker and failed to threaten. LA AGUILILLA settled on the outside, was roused three wide on the turn, drifted out in pursuit of the leader nearing the furlong marker and weakened. FABULOUS FANNY was well placed just off the pace, lugged out leaving the backstretch, dropped from the two path to the rail on the turn, spun into the stretch in the two path, chased under a drive into the final furlong and lacked the needed kick. DEVILLY broke out a bit and was last to commence, was taken in hand briefly early then angled in at the rear, raced at the back under urging, saved ground on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and failed to rally. LIANA B moved in while going to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, raced inside on the turn, was roused under threat late on that bend, lost the advantage into the stretch and faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Fanny
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,lugged out 7/16,2p-ins turn,2p1/4,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Rosemary Potatoes
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled,came out 7/16,3w turn,4w1/4,mvd out1/8,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,settld,ins-2p trn,mvd out3/16,path tkn,alter,rally

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin' Hot Kitty
ENTRY.OWNER: America's Pastimes Stables Liberty House Racing and Mic Duff Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,urged along,3-4w turn,btwn1/16,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Gaze
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,bmp brk,trckd outside,2p,bid5/16,lead1/4,clr,caught

ENTRY.NAME: Devilly
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,angled in,inside turn,mvd out 3/16,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Liana B
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,mvd in,clear pace,ins turn,headed into lane,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Linarite
ENTRY.OWNER: Punk, Jr., William J. and DiLeo, Philip
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,4-3p turn,angled out 1/8,good energy,up place

ENTRY.NAME: La Aguililla
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,roused 3wide turn,drifted out 1/8,weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 4 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. INNER TURF (UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR W HICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALIMAH (IRE) forwardly placed in closest aim of the leader just off the inside through the first turn, tracked that rival three paths off the inside down the backstretch using her cover until the leader tucked to the two path into the far turn, remained three wide now in the clear and came under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command just inside the three-sixteenths and edged away under a drive to prevail. POCA MUCHA saved ground at the tail of the field early on, began to advanced near the far turn and came under coaxing three furlongs from home, cut the corner into upper stretch and tipped out to the two path straightened away, then offered up a mild kick to secure the place honors. KALIFORNIA QUEEN (GER) three wide through the opening bend, chased three wide using the cover of MESSIDOR, tipped four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued four wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to procure the show honors. MESSIDOR (IRE) just off the inside through the first turn, chased three wide behind the cover of SALIMAH down the backstretch, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and stayed on one paced to the finish. SISTER OTOOLE along the inside through the first turn, chased two then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and had no kick. STAR DEVINE (IRE) spurted away early on just off the inside through the first turn, showed the way under rating three then two wide, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, got collared just inside the three-sixteenths and weakened to the end.

ENTRY.NAME: Messidor (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Otoole
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Poca Mucha
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable Wachtel Stable and Zaro Jerold L
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 3/8, cut corner, tip out 2p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Star Devine (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, rated 3-2w, ins 1/4, collared ins 3/16, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Salimah (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, chased 3w, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Kalifornia Queen (GER)
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Madaket Stables LLC First Row Partners and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 3-4w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 52000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUST DEVIL saved ground on the first turn, settled comfortably off the pace, moved closer late on the backstretch, traveled around the far turn in the two path, was roused near the quarter-pole, rallied under the crop to get the lead inside the furlong marker and prevailed under strong urging. CUT THE CORD jostled with a foe after the start while hustled, raced in the three path on the first turn, settled on the outside in second position, moved closer late on the backstretch, chased in the three path on the far turn, was carried six wide into the stretch, moved in while pursuing the clear leader into the final furlong, gained on the winner late and missed while able to get the place. PORTOS rounded the first turn in the three path, climbed into the kickback late on that bend and early on the backstretch, moved out around the five-eighths, was urged late on the backstretch, went four wide on the far turn, was carried seven wide into the stretch, chased outside in the middle of the track, made a bid near the furlong marker but flattened out while able to get the show. TWO THIRTY FIVE went to the front, dropped from four path to the two path on the first turn, opened up a sizable advantage, went around the far turn in the two path, was asked near the quarter-pole then floated six wide into the stretch, led well out in the track into the final furlong then lost the advantage and weakened. PIT BOSS was hustled from the start, settled on the inside, moved closer late on the backstretch, was given his cue on the far turn, chased into the stretch then came under the crop, dropped back into the final furlong and tired. BOLD VICTORY saved ground at the rear on the first turn, settled off the rail on the backstretch, was urged along in the two path going around the far turn, drifted out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. SILVER DUST jostled with a rival after the start, went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, came up empty in the three path on the far turn and retreated. MOUNT TRAVERS hit the inside of the gate at the start, raced in the two path on the first turn, settled off the pace, dropped back late on the backstretch, went three wide on the far turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Victory
ENTRY.OWNER: Englehart Jeffrey S and Final Turn Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,at rear,off inside,2p2nd turn,drift out 3/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Dust Devil
ENTRY.OWNER: Two B and One C Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,settled,closer1/2,2p2nd,rallied,lead ins 1/8,prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Pit Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,ins1st,settled,roused ins2nd,chased,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Mount Travers
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate,2p1st,settled,drop back 1/2,3p2nd,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Portos
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st,climbed3/4,mvd out5/8,urged,4w2nd turn,7w1/4,flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Dust
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled after brk,4w1st,settled outside,3w2nd,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Cut the Cord
ENTRY.COMMENT: jstld after brk,3p1st,settled,closer1/2,chsd 3p2nd turn,chsd,gain

ENTRY.NAME: Two Thirty Five
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-2p1st,clear pace,2p2nd turn,floated 6w1/4,headed ins 1/8,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 5 1/2F Turf CR: 97. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YARROW just off the top pair in pursuit two then three wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, edged away under a drive kept to task. RUNNINGWSCISSORS got brushed when just off the inside five furlongs from home by BAR FOURTEEN due to pressure from ROUGH DRAFT, chased two then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the place honors. WINNERS LAUGH coaxed from the gate, showed the way along the inside under pressure from PHANTOM SMOKE to the outside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared just outside the eighth pole, kept on to preserve the show honors. PHANTOM SMOKE pressed the pace of the aforementioned foe from the outside in the two path, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. ROUGH DRAFT broke outwards brushing the off side stall at the start, chased just off the inside tucking in behind the leader and pulling a bit keen behind foes forcing BAR FOURTEEN to steady behind him five furlongs from home, continued just off the inside through the turn patiently handled until set down spinning three wide for home, then weakened in the drive. BAR FOURTEEN coaxed from the gate, got forced to steady and brushed with RUNNINGWSCISSORS when ROUGH DRAFT tucked directly in front two to three wide near the five furlong marker, chased two to three wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and made no headway. ME 'N SAP three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled three to four wide into upper stretch and made no impact. FOOLISH GHOST chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tired in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Runningwscissors
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed 5/8, chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Bar Fourteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, steady, brush foe 5/8, 2p turn, 4-5w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Rough Draft
ENTRY.OWNER: Clear Stars Stable Mitre Box Stable and Big Toe Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, keen briefly, chased 2p, set down 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Winners Laugh
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pressured pace ins, ins 1/4, collared 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Yarrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, up 1/8, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Phantom Smoke
ENTRY.OWNER: Roman Lawrence P Anthony George CT Racing and Emerald Upstate Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Me 'n Sap
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Horse Racing and Rusba V Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTO HAPPINESS was urged along while lacking early speed, angled to the far outside near the three-quarter pole, lagged well behind under strong encouragement, went around the turn in the five path, came seven wide into the stretch, rallied near the center of the track into the final furlong and closed strongly to win going away. SA FORADADA bumped with rival at the start, settled off the pace, was urged three wide on the turn then driven six wide into the stretch, chased the leading duo into the final furlong and narrowly earned the place while no match for the winner. MURSAL tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid leaving the backstretch, vied in the three path on the turn, turned into upper stretch in the five path while on even terms for the lead, led under a drive into the final furlong and also proved no match for the winner then lost the place but was clear for the show. GRACEFUL ROSE made light contact with a foe at the start, was well placed just off the pace, made a bid near the seven-sixteenths, vied in the two path on the turn, took a short lead late on that bend, floated four wide into the stretch, lost the lead under a drive before the furlong marker, battled until outside the sixteenth-pole and weakened. NEED SOME MONEY settled towards the back, moved from three to five wide under urging on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. MY GIRL JAL was restless in the gate, settled off the pace, was urged along while moving from the two path to the four path on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch, remained on his inside lead in the drive, angled out around the sixteenth-pole and came up empty. CONDIMENT GIRL was hustled to the front then angled in, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the turn, lost the lead near the five-sixteenths, dropped back into upper stretch and tired. MISCREANT settled towards the rear, passed the five-eighths under urging, dropped from the two path to the rail on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch and was no factor. CARBON moved up to race towards the front, dropped back late on the backstretch then moved out, went around the turn in the two path and failed to respond. OBRIGADA stumbled badly at the start and was last to commence, settled on the outside, was roused four wide on the turn, dropped back seven wide into the stretch and faltered then was eased in the final furlong but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Into Happiness
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,angled out 3/4,5w turn,7w1/4,rallied,closed fast,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up,towards front,drop back 1/2,2path turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Miscreant
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,urged 5/8,2path-ins turn,3path 1/4,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Jal
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,settled,urged 2-4p turn,6p,ins lead lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Sa Foradada
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,settled,urged 3w turn,6w1/4,chased,no match,up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Graceful Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: light bmp brk,just off pace,bid7/16,2p trn,led4p1/4,headed1/8,wkn

ENTRY.NAME: Mursal
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi, Vincent S. and Gabrielle Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: trackd outside,bid 7/16,3p trn,5p1/4,led past 1/8,headed,lost 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Condiment Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,angled in,clear pace,rail turn,headed near5/16,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Obrigada
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled bad brk,settled outside,ask 4w trn,7w,falter,eased,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: Need Some Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,3-5wide turn,angled out 3/16,no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1M Inner turf CR: 96. Starter Allowance Purse 70000. INNER TURF (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY SEA COTTAGE (IRE) established the front and showed the way in hand along the inside through the opening bend before taking to the two path down the backstretch settled into a comfortable rhythm through sensible splits, tucked inside with seven-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing nearing the quarter pole as the field in behind began to intensify the pressure, took the inside route into upper stretch set down for the drive, edged away under a drive holding well to the finish kept busy to the end. UNLEASH THE POWER just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun three wide into upper stretch, ran on to chase the winner home willingly along for the place honors. KINGFISH STEVENS tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. FRONT MAN saved ground in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and kept on to the finish. BORN A GAMBLER coaxed from the gate, chased two then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, stayed on one paced to the finish. CHILENO chased two to three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, went three wide into upper stretch, offered no response. FOLIAGE chased along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, offered no rally. AMERICAN GRANT saved ground near the rear of the field, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, cut the corner into upper stretch, had no kick. CONSULTANT just off the inside tracking from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, angled out four wide into upper stretch and came up empty. THUNDERIAN chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun three wide at the head of the stretch, trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Thunderian
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Born a Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Front Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Krakow Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd mid pack, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Schuylerville S. - Grade3 SARATOGA RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 86. Stakes Purse 175000. FOR FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $175 each which should accompany the nomination; $875 to pass the entry box and an additional $875 to start. For ho rses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $875 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% tof ifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden or claiming allowed 2 lbs.; maidens allowed 4 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, July 1, 2023 with 222 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BECKY'S JOKER broke a bit slow, moved up under urging to establish a more forward position, drafted inside to the the two path on the turn, was asked outside the quarter-pole, gained to make a bid between foes in the three path into the stretch, took the lead inside the three-sixteenths then inched away while drifting out, was straightened by the rider inside the furlong marker and drew clear under steady handling. SARATOGA SECRET was coaxed along while pressing the pace on the outside of the leader while loosely between horses, vied in the three path while on even terms for the lead on the turn, gained a short advantage into upper stretch, lost the lead to the winner inside the three-sixteenths, moved inside that drifting foe near the furlong marker, drifted in while proving no match late and was clear for the place. CLOSING ACT settled off the pace, was roused three wide on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and lacked the needed response while just up for the show. WINE ON TAP bobbled ever so slightly while breaking in front, pressed the pace on the outside of two rivals, vied in the four path while asked on the turn, dropped back five wide into upper stretch and capitulated. CARMELINA went to the front, set the pace under pressure from two opponents to her outside, dropped from the two path to the rail early on the turn, lost the advantage while turning into upper stretch in the two path and gave way. SUGAR TREAT settled on the outside near the back, was urged four wide on the turn and failed to threaten. KISS FOR LUCK was urged along at the rear, angled in late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Carmelina
ENTRY.OWNER: Cash is King LLC and LC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside foes,vied 2path-ins turn,2p into lane,headed,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Becky's Joker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit sle st,mvd up,ins-2p trn,bid 3p btwn1/4,lead ins3/16,drft,clr

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed,pressed,vied 3path turn,4p1/4,led3/16,headed,no match

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,rousd 3w trn,angled out 3/16,lacked needed response,up3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1 1/16M Turf CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwi se Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THUNDARA three wide through the first turn, chased three then four wide coming under coaxing inside the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to collar the leader just inside the eighth pole, edged clear under a drive to prevail. ARISAEMA tossed her head at the start getting away last in a tangle and conceded six to seven lengths to the front, saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out five wide into upper stretch, angled inwards a furlong out and offered up late foot to secure the place honors while too late to threaten the winner. JANNIE MAE coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside, remained patiently handled until set down spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught just inside the eighth pole, kept on to preserve the show honors. CHARISSE got bumped at the start by POWER AND GLORY, who broke outwards, chased just off the inside, tipped four to five wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. STONE OF DESTINY chased just off the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. APRIL FIRST along the inside through the first turn, chased three wide down the backstretch before tipping five wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. MARY KATHERINE chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five to six wide for home and weakened in the late stages. FOLLOW THE FED chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. POWER AND GLORY broke out at the start bumping CHARISSE, chased along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the far turn coaxed along from the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. SO ARE YOU just off the inside in pursuit from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing four wide at the five-sixteenths, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and made no impact. PIMENOVA three wide in pursuit, got coaxed along at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, tired. HERE WE GO AGAIN coaxed from the gate, led briefly before being restrained to ease off of JANNIE MAE and grew rank under the restraint just off the inside through the first turn, tracked the leader in closest aim for the opening half mile, came under coaxing midway on the far turn in retreat, swung three wide into upper stretch and folded.

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 5/16, 3w upper, weakened
